Package io.github.readonly.api.scheduler

Interface Scheduler

All Known Implementing Classes:
BotScheduler
public interface Scheduler

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TaskService
    createAsyncExecutor(Object plugin)
    Creates a new ExecutorService that can be used to schedule asynchronous tasks through the standard Java concurrency interfaces.
    TaskService
    createSyncExecutor(Object plugin)
    Creates a new ExecutorService that can be used to schedule synchronous tasks through the standard Java concurrency interfaces.

    Gets a new instance of a ITask.Builder.

    Gets the ideal delay between ticks in milliseconds.

    Returns a set of all currently scheduled tasks.

    Returns a set of all currently scheduled tasks for either asynchronous or synchronous execution.

    Returns a set of all currently scheduled tasks owned by the given plugin.

    Retrieves a scheduled or running task by its unique ID.

  • Method Details

    • createTaskBuilder

      ITask.Builder createTaskBuilder()
      Gets a new instance of a ITask.Builder.
      Returns:
      A new task builder

    • getTaskById

      Optional<ITask> getTaskById(UUID id)
      Retrieves a scheduled or running task by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the task
      Returns:
      The scheduled or running task, or Optional.empty()

    • getTasksByName

      Set<ITask> getTasksByName(String pattern)
      Returns a set of ITasks that match the Regular Expression pattern.
      Parameters:
      pattern - The regular expression pattern applied to the name of tasks
      Returns:
      A set of ITasks that have names that match the pattern, the set will be empty if no names match

    • getScheduledTasks

      Set<ITask> getScheduledTasks()
      Returns a set of all currently scheduled tasks.
      Returns:
      A set of scheduled tasks

    • getScheduledTasks

      Set<ITask> getScheduledTasks(boolean async)
      Returns a set of all currently scheduled tasks for either asynchronous or synchronous execution.
      Parameters:
      async - True to get all async tasks, false to get all sync tasks
      Returns:
      A set of scheduled tasks for the given sync type

    • getScheduledTasks

      Set<ITask> getScheduledTasks(Object plugin)
      Returns a set of all currently scheduled tasks owned by the given plugin.
      Parameters:
      plugin - The plugin that created the tasks
      Returns:
      A set of scheduled tasks

    • getPreferredTickInterval

      int getPreferredTickInterval()
      Gets the ideal delay between ticks in milliseconds. The server aims to stabilise at this value.
      Returns:
      The preferred tick interval

    • createSyncExecutor

      TaskService createSyncExecutor(Object plugin)
      Creates a new ExecutorService that can be used to schedule synchronous tasks through the standard Java concurrency interfaces.
      Parameters:
      plugin - The plugin that will own the created tasks
      Returns:
      A new executor service that can be used to execute synchronous tasks

    • createAsyncExecutor

      TaskService createAsyncExecutor(Object plugin)
      Creates a new ExecutorService that can be used to schedule asynchronous tasks through the standard Java concurrency interfaces.
      Parameters:
      plugin - The plugin that will own the created tasks
      Returns:
      A new executor service that can be used to execute asynchronous tasks
      See Also:
      • ITask.Builder.async()
